item.description: 1. Emoji 🍰 2. Code 1let a = 1; 2let b = 2; 3 4// 实例对象上会有name age属性，play方法 5function Person(name, age) { 6 this.name = name; 7 this.age = age; 8 this.play = function () { }; 9} 10// 原型对象上会有方法 11Person.prototype.sleep =
